alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Southern Worcester; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 9:30PM EST until January 05 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM TO 10 PM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Areas of freezing drizzle. * WHERE...The Worcester Hills and mainly the lower elevations of far northern Massachusetts north of route 2 to the New Hampshire border. * WHEN...Temperatures should remain above freezing Thursday morning, so no issues are expected for the morning commute. However...temps may drop to near freezing Thursday afternoon and evening across the Worcester Hills and the lower elevations of far northern Massachusetts near the New Hampshire border. This may allow for areas of freezing drizzle to result in slippery travel for the Thursday evening commute. * IMPACTS...Slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Franklin; Southern Worcester; Western Essex
